div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-hidden design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.h1: Compass Charter School is an intentionally diverse, progressive, public elementary school that opened in the Fall of 2014. Our inquiry-based, integrated curriculum focuses on sustainability and the arts. We believe that children learn best when they engage in hands-on and playful experiences that are as authentic as possible.

div.data-block-json: {"blockAnimation":"none","layout":"caption-hidden","overlay":false,"description":{"html":"Uploaded by Compass Charter School on 2015-12-29."},"hSize":null,"floatDir":null,"html":"<iframe src=\"//www.youtube.com/embed/Z2R_zrUlzdA?wmode=opaque&enablejsapi=1\" height=\"480\" width=\"854\" scrolling=\"no\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\">\n</iframe>","url":"https://youtu.be/Z2R_zrUlzdA","width":854,"height":480,"providerName":"YouTube","thumbnailUrl":"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/Z2R_zrUlzdA/hqdefault.jpg","resolvedBy":"youtube"}

div.p: Compass Charter School is a safe and nurturing educational environment that honors the individuality of each learner. By engaging in a process of inquiry, our graduates will be equipped with the necessary skills to lead fulfilling personal and professional lives, including a developed sense of self, the ability to think in innovative and flexible ways, and the inspiration to make a positive impact on their community.

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-hidden design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

Are you a prospective family looking to apply to Compass Charter School for the 2020-2021 school year?

a.data-description: Two of our educators created a mini series of videos and wrote a blog post for families to support with writing while we’re on remote learning. Take a look at the link in bio. #writingisforeveryone #pandemicasportal #writing #writingworkshop #community #compassyear6

a.data-description: After cancelling our annual Gala, we are launching The Compass CARES Fund to support our school and our community members in need. Our CARES values have never been more important and have never been more powerfully on display by our students, our staff, and our families. Thank you for helping us sustain our community at this time. Link to donate in bio. #community #compasscares #thankyou #supportingourschoolsandourkids #fundraising #annualgala #wereallinthistogether #covid19 #progressiveeducation #intentionallydiverseschool #learningbydoing #compassyear6

After cancelling our annual Gala, we are launching The Compass CARES Fund to support our school and our community members in need. Our CARES values have never been more important and have never been more powerfully on display by our students, our staff, and our families. Thank you for helping us sustain our community at this time. a.data-description: Thank you to all of the members of our community who were able to join this morning’s community gathering! It was beautiful to have so many people together virtually, sing some of our favorite songs, and celebrate March birthdays. We’re still working on being able to host large numbers of people with video and audio and we’ll keep at it for next week. We’ll share the recording of today’s gathering on parentsquare. #community #wereallinthistogether #learningbydoing #singing #communitygathering #compassyear6

a.data-description: We miss our community and want to keep our special Wednesday ritual going while we’re away from school! We will host our first virtual Community Gathering on zoom at 10:30 tomorrow morning. Compass Families, check parentsquare for the link to join. We will also record and share after for those who can’t make it at 10:30. Compass Friends and Graduates, send us a DM if you’d like the link to join us. We’d love to have you! #community #wereallinthistogether #communitygathering #music #singing #marchbdays #families #compassyear6

img.alt: We miss our community and want to keep our special Wednesday ritual going while we’re away from school! We will host our first virtual Community Gathering on zoom at 10:30 tomorrow morning. Compass Families, check parentsquare for the link to join. We will also record and share after for those who can’t make it at 10:30. Compass Friends and Graduates, send us a DM if you’d like the link to join us. We’d love to have you! #community #wereallinthistogether #communitygathering #music #singing #marchbdays #families #compassyear6

a.data-description: As we end week two of remote learning, more of our systems are in place, including individualized supports. Here a first grader works with Janis, our literacy specialist. Thank you to our staff, families, and students for adapting to a new way of doing school with patience, grace, and a sense of community. #remotelearning #community #gratitude #literacy #learningbydoing #compassyear6

a.data-description: Our kindergartners have been going on object hunts in their homes to find objects that end in a particular sound! Here are some piles created by a Sycamore Class child. Objects that end with the /f/ sound: knife, giraffe, leaf, scarf and objects that end with the /d/ sound: dad, bird, iPad, seaweed, bread #remotelearning #objecthunt #learningbydoing #progressiveeducation #kindergarten #literacy #community #compassyear6

a.data-description: As this first week of remote learning comes to an end, we are feeling extremely thankful for our students, their families, our staff, and all of the rest of you out there figuring out this remote learning/working thing and/or managing kids at home while going into work each day. Thank you from the bottom of our hearts! While you’re here, take a look at what some of our Compass kids did this week. Compass Families, please share your photos with us or tag us in your remote learning photos. #community #gratitude #remotelearning #brooklynkids #learningbydoing #wereallinthistogether #compassyear6
